description: Retrospective application for retention of existing Use  (Class B8) for  storage/distribution
decision_conditions: The applicant has not demonstrated, on the balance of probabilities, that the site, Seething Wells Filter Beds, is or indeed has been used for storage as per Class B8 of the Town and Country Planning (use Classes) Order 1987 for the required period of time, as such, the use of the site for storage (Use CLass B8) is not lawful.

The applicant is informed that the submitted details, as set out above, are agreed and that the Planning Condition 3 (Demolition Management Plan) of planning permission 21/02017/CREG3 is hereby discharged subject to carrying out the development in accordance with the details hereby approved.

Please provide existing and proposed roof plans at a recognised scale (at 1:50 or 1:100 for example), showing the outline of entire property not just part and showing dimensions of proposed work. The plans must show the direction of North. Although the inclusion of a scale bar is not mandatory, it is highly encouraged.The submitted roof plans do not have a North point.
